item.title: Docs: v3.9.13
item.description:
Release time: 2023-08-16 14:54:45

cloudpods

Repo: https://github.com/yunionio/cloudpods

19 commits to cloudpods - v3.9.13 since this release.

Bug Fixes (19)

  • set vcpu vendor_id based on host cpu vendor_id for release/3.9 (#17713) (54874df19f, Jian Qiu)
  • allow host access_mac nullable (c93520ed5c, Qiu Jian)
  • lbcluster reference count (66222d33ee, Qiu Jian)
  • climc: avoid panic (0bfaa1a85d, ioito)
  • cloudmon: avoid panic (059deacef3, ioito)
  • cloudmon: cloudaccout update (4a5de78d09, ioito)
  • host: add gpu device when driver isn’t bind (9fb6a0b98d, wanyaoqi)
  • host: try reloading telegraf by restarting docker (fdad35210f, Zexi Li)
  • host-deployer: detect image arch incorrect (998cfed30b, wanyaoqi)
  • monitor: return error if metric is nil (#17576) (9691902f48, Zexi Li)
  • monitor: fix montior alert startTimeFormat (f811c83a61, 马鸿飞)
  • region: vendor update (19ae1835b9, ioito)
  • region: vendor update (fb6e2bd043, ioito)
  • region: set scheduler failed brand unknown (887161d428, ioito)
  • region: usage for nic (43a2ed88a8, ioito)
  • region: acl name (4482ed8393, ioito)
  • region: esxi add vmdk disk (8d79fe7f93, ioito)
  • region: esxi disk with vmdk format (0a15eb3f75, ioito)
  • scheduler: auto allocation network selection is not working (5cab3d187a, Zexi Li)

cloudpods-operator

Repo: https://github.com/yunionio/cloudpods-operator

2 commits to cloudpods-operator - v3.9.13 since this release.

Bug Fixes (1)

  • influxdb config revisit 20230706 (9a75ab4b, Qiu Jian)

Features (1)

  • operator: change system.uptime level (d878e01d, Zexi Li)

dashboard

Repo: https://github.com/yunionio/dashboard

11 commits to dashboard - v3.9.13 since this release.

Bug Fixes (5)

  • description edit no reaction (55d4bfa37, GuoLiBin6)
  • 9120: image select error (1e202af7f, GuoLiBin6)
  • 9153: monitor dashboard export accuracy (546606bdc, GuoLiBin6)
  • 9191: workflow apply accuracy (94b0b4f9f, GuoLiBin6)
  • 9236: 新建硬盘，需校验硬盘容量数字为必填 (2291bb0a9, gaomingjiu@yunion.cn)

Features (6)

  • 4405: 监控查询及告警磁盘文案优化 (59543c01d, gaomingjiu@yunion.cn)
  • 4451: Daemon虚拟机文案修改为自动启动，同时增加备注 (16236591b, gaomingjiu@yunion.cn)
  • 4459: 优化合并镜像校验提示 (cc226f047, gaomingjiu@yunion.cn)
  • 4459: 优化合并镜像支持拖拽排序 (1587c4a8c, gaomingjiu@yunion.cn)
  • 4459: 支持将多个镜像组合成一个主机镜像 (ed188f110, gaomingjiu@yunion.cn)
  • 4461: 镜像最小磁盘要求增加说明 (4ad1be9c2, gaomingjiu@yunion.cn)

ocboot

Repo: https://github.com/yunionio/ocboot

10 commits to ocboot - v3.9.13 since this release.

Bug Fixes (4)

  • clickhouse,ip: 解决部署时ip选择的问题 (6f6ff7d, Zhang Dongliang)
  • mariadb,kylin: mariadb init issue (1eca3ec, Zhang Dongliang)
  • typo: 解决拉取镜像报错的问题 (f67fd50, Zhang Dongliang)
  • typo: 变量名typo修复 (7f2da31, Zhang Dongliang)

Features (1)

  • kernel: 内核相关参数，部署时和重启时自动加载 (4e03ade, Zhang Dongliang)

Hotfix (1)

  • other os comp (2cb3f3b, Zhang Dongliang)

Others (4)

  • hotfix var def issue (5082138, Zhang Dongliang)
  • centos mariadb issue (d4f9050, Zhang Dongliang)
  • centos mariadb issue (7a7061a, Zhang Dongliang)
  • minor update version for 3.9 to v3.9.12 (6e81d75, Zhang Dongliang)

item.title: Docs: v3.9.12
item.description:
Release time: 2023-07-14 09:48:44

cloudpods

Repo: https://github.com/yunionio/cloudpods

15 commits to cloudpods - v3.9.12 since this release.

Bug Fixes (15)

  • detailed pending usage error (#17342) (6211743469, Jian Qiu)
  • add process timeout option default_process_timeout_seconds (2e651ba117, Qiu Jian)
  • baremetal: skip ‘Volatile Size’ line when detecting memory size (ec8c855130, Zexi Li)
  • baremetal: panic occured when fetch powerMetrics (8cd2c65731, Zexi Li)
  • climc: add port for ssh (#17515) (8f3be4d36e, 屈轩)
  • docker,buildx: 兼容本地registry 模式 (2d19cf003a, Zhang Dongliang)
  • esxi-agent: reset password log (4fe9ee76d7, ioito)
  • host: qemu arm add qga params (#17508) (f2b1a31029, wanyaoqi)
  • region: avoid aliyun elastic cache cycle sync (d6130aca4b, ioito)
  • region: reset esxi osinfo (#17478) (c89fb6be46, 屈轩)
  • region: esxi vm migrate for search ivm (#17481) (659dfcce9d, 屈轩)
  • region: default username (551c1f8316, ioito)
  • region: vendor update (1453ebfa34, ioito)
  • region: vendor update (448a35fe5f, ioito)
  • region: sync zstack vm ip (09083a16bd, ioito)

dashboard

Repo: https://github.com/yunionio/dashboard

12 commits to dashboard - v3.9.12 since this release.

Bug Fixes (8)

  • 修改磁盘驱动增加SSD开关备注信息 (01a31d20e, gaomingjiu@yunion.cn)
  • Login prompt timer setting upper limit time (a20323b20, GuoLiBin6)
  • 9104: 磁盘驱动反显有误 (22e110e13, gaomingjiu@yunion.cn)
  • 9150: 虚拟机导出系统列增加版本信息 (0916b4788, gaomingjiu@yunion.cn)
  • 9150: 虚拟机导出系统列需与列表查看展示一致 (f06c7906f, gaomingjiu@yunion.cn)
  • 9167: ldp hide alert text (0a2de28f6, GuoLiBin6)
  • 9171: 产品激活申请license隐藏线上申请路径 (424ebaba7, gaomingjiu@yunion.cn)
  • baremetal: baremetal ssh login (8a38475b1, Zexi Li)

Features (4)

  • 列表支持资源权限控制 (767bc15f0, gaomingjiu@yunion.cn)
  • 4051: 项目列表增加过滤条件：用户，组，认证源。域，组，用户列表增加过滤条件：认证源 (e7fd93733, boss_think@163.com)
  • 4371: 云账号-资源统计修改为开机率指标 (93d92516f, boss_think@163.com)
  • 4439: 容器集群导入支持指定域 (e1bf280dd, gaomingjiu@yunion.cn)

kubecomps

Repo: https://github.com/yunionio/kubecomps

3 commits to kubecomps - v3.9.12 since this release.

Bug Fixes (2)

  • kubeserver: list chart by repo id (1d4e208e, Zexi Li)
  • kubeserver: add chart_info for release (78965c88, Zexi Li)

Features (1)

  • kubeserver: fill pods_status of release (565112ec, Zexi Li)

ocboot

Repo: https://github.com/yunionio/ocboot

11 commits to ocboot - v3.9.12 since this release.

Bug Fixes (10)

  • release v3.9.11 (33fc912, Zexi Li)
  • debian,ovmf: 解决debian 系统的ofvm 路径问题 (52a38f9, Zhang Dongliang)
  • deploy: add debug msg to show init args (f3b08a3, Zhang Dongliang)
  • kernel: 配置内核参数，防止上传镜像失败 (5bfabe5, Zhang Dongliang)
  • networkmanager: 在重启networkmanager 前后，确保resolev.conf 不改变 (3acc6e9, Zhang Dongliang)
  • os: 解决语法兼容问题bool (050badb, Zhang Dongliang)
  • os: 严格界定所支持的os（centos/kylin/debian/uos/euler）及其版本范围 (0856dd2, Zhang Dongliang)
  • repo: 对在线、离线安装，启用不同的repo (85dc26a, Zhang Dongliang)
  • repo: 优化redhat家族os在线/离线安装时的repo判断问题 (016d62a, Zhang Dongliang)
  • version: update version to 3.9.11 (5498668, Zhang Dongliang)

Others (1)

  • fix os detection bugs (45492e2, Zhang Dongliang)

item.title: Docs: v3.9.11
item.description:
Release time: 2023-06-14 18:33:48

cloudpods

Repo: https://github.com/yunionio/cloudpods

27 commits to cloudpods - v3.9.11 since this release.

Bug Fixes (24)

  • apigateway endpoint empty error (74c67b6967, Qiu Jian)

  • prevent policy violate when assigning policy to roles (678b8171dd, Qiu Jian)

  • disable policy update when enable three member system (d4fe392e26, Qiu Jian)
  • apigateway: image upload with properties (c14fee7bbf, ioito)
  • baremetal: skip running sysinit.sh when arch is aarch64 (#17106) (29a8f731f2, Zexi Li)

  • docker,buildx: 跨平台编译优化 (b004c296fa, Zhang Dongliang)
  • host: don’t sync status on resume from postmigrate (dae645b421, wanyaoqi)

  • region: index order (e027bdd07d, ioito)

  • region: qga set password not record logininfo (ae00c4fecd, wanyaoqi)

Optimized (1)

1 commits to cloudpods-operator - v3.9.11 since this release.

dashboard

19 commits to dashboard - v3.9.11 since this release.

Bug Fixes (11)

  • code formatter error (69708b3e0, mj)

  • 9012: 补充权限信息 (cc7170d36, gaomingjiu@yunion.cn)

item.title: Docs: v3.9.10
item.description:
Release time: 2023-05-10 20:18:44

cloudpods

Repo: https://github.com/yunionio/cloudpods

54 commits to cloudpods - v3.9.10 since this release.

Bug Fixes (53)

  • auth getStats should ignore no permission error (30b3c4e8f5, Qiu Jian)
  • three member policy adjustment 20230507 (001a49c7b1, Qiu Jian)
  • domain tag filter not working (75a6570b31, Qiu Jian)
  • only request error show time (37bfde3756, ioito)
  • update vendor 20230413 (#16469) (fcc7a2a6cb, Jian Qiu)
  • avoid panic when sync vmware host (56ab043a62, ioito)
  • backport opslog clickhouse partition expression to 3.9 (#16394) (f239662550, Jian Qiu)
  • allow vm monitor in status live migrating (37124d871a, Qiu Jian)
  • clickhouse parttion expression of divide inconstent 3.9 (#16437) (7a57356dd0, Jian Qiu)
  • baremetal: panic occured when using SSD as raid PD (09050b427d, Zexi Li)
  • cloudmon: bingo metric (4589a43fe2, ioito)
  • cloudmon: esxi disk usage (7b569da70a, ioito)
  • cloudmon: support skip pull azure memory and disk usage metric (f7b7869b5d, ioito)
  • common: show exception with remote addr and duration (680711f244, ioito)
  • common: log time zone and format (cfa2077932, ioito)
  • common: show request time with rfc3339 (aa6f55f1d2, ioito)
  • common: log time with time zone (953fdaa914, ioito)
  • devtool: panic occurred cause of nil ctx (279a623467, Zexi Li)
  • glance: support filter image by os archs (255e51f1ee, ioito)
  • host: don’t return error on disk snap chain miss (d28ffc66e7, wanyaoqi)
  • host: set default live migrate bandwidth unlimited (3329a782f8, wanyaoqi)
  • keystone: avoid panic when sync scope reosurce (8942f18cd1, ioito)
  • monitor: panic of StatisticHandler (3ff14f2559, Zexi Li)
  • monitor: wrong tag filter when get metric measurement (ea69795d84, Zexi Li)
  • monitor: truncated JSONObject of alert model (#16935) (654d47d526, Zexi Li)
  • monitor: disable query signature defaultly (f89ac09124, Zexi Li)
  • monitor,apihelper: list storages without details (f2837d9795, Zexi Li)
  • region: host status (275cfcad23, ioito)
  • region: sync purge vpc (fa71b2a6f5, ioito)
  • region: change modelarts validateDeleteCondition (67180c9cfe, mhf)
  • region: log with account disconnect reason (0c76154e80, ioito)
  • region: vendor update for aws region (af18ebdb2c, ioito)
  • region: support import private k8s (85fc86a67e, ioito)
  • region: check disk purge get host error is sql.ErrNoRows (656639cf80, wanyaoqi)
  • region: handle probe-isolated-device error (2b2f0a1bfb, Zexi Li)
  • region: support fast sync cloud resources (347a99475a, ioito)
  • region: optimized cloudprovider list (b34e8b94fd, ioito)
  • region: vendor update (4bf9a46872, ioito)
  • region: remove useless server sku (0e760ccf6f, ioito)
  • region: add table index (#16896) (9508771b34, 屈轩)
  • region: vendor update for openstack nic (5c71afab3b, ioito)
  • region: optimized storage-list (#16913) (bd5c4d1bd0, 屈轩)
  • region: modelarts delete deff failed,timeout (220f1d0b13, mhf)
  • region: not set default data when batch creating disks (77dbe36b31, Zexi Li)
  • region: openstack keypair (a16afce1cc, ioito)
  • region: azure china user create (194a9e4543, ioito)
  • region: optimized guest and cachedimage list speed (04e6ce0bb0, ioito)
  • region: support fast sync cloud resources (929b2fb479, ioito)
  • region: addModelartsCreateFailedReason (675c2ef3b5, mhf)
  • region: vender update (#16369) (0b1074b6fc, 屈轩)
  • region,host: migrate with out chain snapshots (b30306a651, wanyaoqi)
  • scheduler: skip load esxi network free-port cache (1ead3a6e50, Zexi Li)

  • common tablefilter i18n error (2e38285bd, GuoLiBin6)

Bugfix (1)

  • 8963: 通知渠道邮箱不应该展示2个 (c55052a67, boss_think@163.com)

Features (5)

  • update gitignore file (0789eb22a, gaomingjiu@yunion.cn)
  • 去掉错误源信息中的时间由后端统一提供 (8643d0005, gaomingjiu@yunion.cn)
  • 4283: 迁移最大带宽限制改进 (b50c64a39, boss_think@163.com)

Repo: https://github.com/yunionio/kubecomps

4 commits to kubecomps - v3.9.10 since this release.

  • kubeserver: delete empty address machine (eed93657, Zexi Li)
  • kubeserver: set docker none bridge (19d43e57, Zexi Li)
  • kubeserver: create pod resources (1f2870f3, Zexi Li)

Others (1)

  • change json unmarshal (a3d15114, Zexi Li)

ocboot

Repo: https://github.com/yunionio/ocboot

10 commits to ocboot - v3.9.10 since this release.

Bug Fixes (7)

  • backup: 自动备份检测条件修正 (b575315, Zhang Dongliang)
  • backup: 自动备份:删除某些配置行 (2c9a5c4, Zhang Dongliang)
  • backup: enable auto backup for ee users (1fadf48, Zhang Dongliang)
  • clickhouse: 检测所有相关服务的clickhouse配置 (e2ebc67, Zhang Dongliang)
  • clickhouse,meter: 解决clickhouse的meter部署问题 (1265c14, Zhang Dongliang)
  • kernel,reboot: 优化kernel检测与重启的逻辑 (6375fe6, Zhang Dongliang)

item.title: Docs: v3.9.0
item.description:
Release time: 2022-06-06 12:39:35

  • disable disk multi-queue (53311dbd03, Qiu Jian)
  • migrate no event notes (8d53a3d8e2, Qiu Jian)
  • more detailed log for server hange_config (#14360) (c39fda77c5, Jian Qiu)

  • release/3.9 打包流程变更：新增 onecloud-ee 打包 rpm/climc-ee 的步骤； (0c2f9b5, Zhang Dongliang)
